sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RecalculationConstraintsStrategy</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Strategy for Recalculation Constraints</description>
        <name>RecalculationConstraintsStrategy</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RecalculationConstraintsStrategy = Class.create();
RecalculationConstraintsStrategy.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    recalculationConstraint: function(topTaskRecord, current) {
        var recalculationConstraintClass;
		if (topTaskRecord.instanceOf('pm_program')) {
            recalculationConstraintClass = new ProgramRecalculationConstraints();
        } else {
            recalculationConstraintClass = new BaseRecalculationConstraints();
        }
        return recalculationConstraintClass.getConstraints(topTaskRecord, current);
    },

    type: 'RecalculationConstraintsStrategy'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-01-08 01:42:04</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8cff67719f301200598a5bb0657fcf86</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RecalculationConstraintsStrategy</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Planned Task_v2" source="com.snc.planned_task_v2">e93557642fc10110d8a4d5f62799b623</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8cff67719f301200598a5bb0657fcf86</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-02-15 08:48:33</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>620</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
